attributes.action: Allow every pupil to wear canvas shoes all over the UK (vans etc)
attributes.background: Let pupils wear what shoes they want that follow guidelines such as plain black old skool vans and air forces, as they don’t have disturbance to any kind of learning.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about what shoes children wear are not a matter for the UK Government or Parliament.
